729713f-b.text:
Stuyvesant Street (left to right), at iall Street, showing, at the N. W. corner of the two thoroughfares, the Staten lIsland Academy and, at the N. E. corner (right), the Staten lIsland Institute of Arts and Sciences. Construction is going on on the S. E. corner of the intersection.
August 3, 1928
P. i. Sperr
(2)
The same, from a slightly different angle. The five-story house is at the S. W. corner of the intersection.
August 3, 1928
P. lL. Sperr
